AGRegexTemplateMatcher.h

00002 //  ICUTemplateMatcher.h

00007 
00008 #import <Foundation/Foundation.h>
00009 
00010 #import "MGTemplateEngine.h"
00011 
00012 /*
00013  This is an example Matcher for MGTemplateEngine, implemented using libicucore on Leopard, 
00014  via the RegexKitLite library: http://regexkit.sourceforge.net/#RegexKitLite
00015  
00016  This project includes everything you need, as long as you're building on Mac OS X 10.5 or later.
00017  
00018  Other matchers can easily be implemented using the MGTemplateEngineMatcher protocol,
00019  if you prefer to use another regex framework, or use another matching method entirely.
00020  */
00021 
00022 @interface AGRegexTemplateMatcher : NSObject <MGTemplateEngineMatcher> {
00023  MGTemplateEngine *engine;
00024  NSString *markerStart;
00025  NSString *markerEnd;
00026  NSString *exprStart;
00027  NSString *exprEnd;
00028  NSString *filterDelimiter;
00029  NSString *templateString;
00030  NSString *regex;
00031 }
00032 
00033 @property(assign) MGTemplateEngine *engine; // weak ref
00034 @property(retain) NSString *markerStart;
00035 @property(retain) NSString *markerEnd;
00036 @property(retain) NSString *exprStart;
00037 @property(retain) NSString *exprEnd;
00038 @property(retain) NSString *filterDelimiter;
00039 @property(retain) NSString *templateString;
00040 @property(retain) NSString *regex;
00041 
00042 + (AGRegexTemplateMatcher *)matcherWithTemplateEngine:(MGTemplateEngine *)theEngine;
00043 
00044 - (NSArray *)argumentsFromString:(NSString *)argString;
00045 
00046 @end
